Text:
Sorry but someone pointed out the banned episodes were going out of sync. Somehow their playing back at 25fps instead of 23.976 like their supposed to so I have to reupload the season 1 torrent again once more with the fixed framerate banned episodes 35 and 38.


You can just delete the banned episodes folder and redownload it after I provide the reupload link, keeping the same files you already have and have it do a file re-check with your torrent client and you will resume where you left off.
